about_the_game:
◆ 3D Renders, Illustrations and Animations!


◇ 300+ high-quality 4k images in JPG format
◇ 50 Animations

◆ NOTE: To access the Digital Artbook:


1. Right click "Sky Resort 2" in the Steam Library
2. Go to Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files
3. Open the "Artbook" folder

content_descriptors.notes:
This is an ADULT Artbook meant to be watched by a mature audience only.

It includes explicit, sexual material that some viewers may find offensive.

The story contains:
◇ Futanari on Female sexual acts
◇ Public Sex
◇ Kissing
◇ Cum Inflation
◇ Large Insertions
◇ Implied use of alcohol
◇ Crude language

The characters depicted and shown in the game are over 18 years old.
